0.1.name: wordpress/primal-for-wp
0.1.description:
Check out a working version of the plugin installed on our very ownPrimal blog and see how we are increasing the value of our published content!

Want to engage your readership on a whole new level? Provide highly relevant news and information from across the Web, tailored specifically to your individual interests.

Primal for WordPress unlocks the power of your WordPress site's interest graph, delivering to your readers highly relevant and up-to-date information, tailored to each page you write.

Working directly with Primal's data service, the plugin automatically builds rich interest graphs around your pages, filtering news and information from across the Web. Contextual links to matching related content are displayed to your visitors, embedded alongside your post. Think of it as a personalized recommendation engine that promotes similarly themed content to your readers. This means real-time delivery of suggested content
